act.name: MaharashtraPublicAct

preface.shortTitle: Bombay Rents, Hotel and Lodging House Rates Control, Bombay Land Requisition and Bombay Government Premises (Eviction) (Amendment) Act, 1999
preface.longTitle: An Act to unify, consolidate and amend the law relating to the control of rent and repairs of certain premises and of eviction and for encouraging the construction of new houses by assuring a fair return on the investment by landlords and to provide for the matters connected with the purposes aforesaid.

act.preamble: WHEREAS it is expedient to unify, consolidate and amend the laws prevailing in the different parts of the State relating to the control of rents and repairs of certain premises and of eviction and for encouraging the construction of new houses by assuring a fair return and to provide for the matters connected with the purposes aforesaid; It is hereby enacted in the Fiftieth Year of the Republic of India as follows:---

subsection.content: This Act may be called the Maharashtra Rent Control Act, 1999.
It shall extend to the whole of the State of Maharashtra. Short title, extent and commencement.

It shall come into force on such date
31 March 2000, vide, G. N., H & SAD., No. MEA. 2000/CR-14/Bhanika, dated the 30 March 2000, published in Maharashtra Government Gazette, 2000, Part-IV-B, Extra No. 84, p. 297
as the State Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, appoint.
